Some really wonderful people work here.

review_title: A place that cares about people, both patients and employees

cons: People in the community don't seem to know about Neighborhood even though its been around for decades.

job_title: Certified Dental Assistant in Tampa, FL
pros: Team work, help the community
cons: The salary is super low

pros: In my two years with the organization, I have only positive things to say. The organization itself genuinely cares about the population we are committed to serving and the staff who do so. The Senior Admin are wonderful, fun and down to earth people. The organization itself is newer in comparison to some of the other health systems in the area, but they have grown to serve everyone, with attentiveness for those who are typically underserved. I can stand by the work that’s done and know their genuine mission is caring for PEOPLE not inflating their pockets, yet remaining fiscally responsible. My department has had dramatic growth, and a manager who is our greatest advocate, and seeks to improve. Amidst COVID I have seen NHC step up for the community and its staff, I am so thoroughly humbled to work for such an awesome organization, and hope to see it grow and serve to its fullest extent.
cons: Newer organization, working out some small organizational kinks.
